name: Ranosys
description: Ranosys is an multi-award-winning and CMMI Level 3 Global Digital Consulting Company with international footprints in the UK, US, APAC, and Middle East regions. With our progressive vision, and relentless dedication- we’re on a mission to help our clients achieve their Tomorrow, Today. Combining the power of platform partnerships with Adobe Experience Cloud, Salesforce, OutSystems, Shopify Plus, commercetools and Microsoft, along with experience design, and cutting-edge technologies, Ranosys assists global enterprises in driving their digital transformation, digital commerce, and product engineering initiatives. Our innovative approach has earned us the 2023 Adobe Practice Growth Partner of the Year, 2022 Salesforce Talent Alliance Diversity Champion of the Year, 2021 Adobe Partner of the Year, 2020 Delivery Quality Solution of the Year, and 2020 Best Digital Consulting Partner of the Year awards. With 8 global offices in London, New York, San Francisco, Dubai, Singapore, Pune, Jaipur, and Bikaner, we’ve built a staunch reputation for our data-driven designs, innovative thinking, robust planning, seamless delivery, and client experience goals.
features: Be it new technology, training & certifications, or traveling to serve clients overseas - we present you with opportunities that help you grow.
Quality matters in everything we do. For us, our commitment to quality is a journey and a habit. We don't mind running that extra mile for it.
We celebrate every effort, hard work, and achievement of our teammates. We believe our employees to be the heart of our organization.
Headline: Digital Commerce, Product Engineering & Digital Transformation
ShortDescription: Ranosys is an multi-award-winning and CMMI Level 3 Global Digital Consulting Company with international footprints in the UK, US, APAC, and Middle East regions. With our progressive vision, and relentless dedication- we’re on a mission to help our clients achieve their Tomorrow, Today.
enhanced_description: Ranosys is a multi-award-winning and CMMI Level 3 Global Digital Consulting Company with international footprints across the UK, US, APAC, and Middle East regions. They specialize in assisting global enterprises with their digital transformation, digital commerce, and product engineering initiatives. Leveraging strategic platform partnerships with leading technologies such as Adobe Experience Cloud, Salesforce, OutSystems, Shopify Plus, commercetools, and Microsoft, Ranosys delivers comprehensive solutions. Within their broad consulting portfolio, Ranosys offers services related to Total Rewards, including employee recognition software, sales compensation software, and compensation management software, aimed at improving employee happiness and engagement.
key_use_cases: Implementation and management of Employee Recognition software
Implementation and management of Sales Compensation software
Implementation and management of Compensation Management software
competitive_advantages: CMMI Level 3 certified for process maturity and quality
Extensive global presence with 8 offices across UK, US, APAC, and Middle East
Strategic platform partnerships with leading technologies (Adobe Experience Cloud, Salesforce, OutSystems, Shopify Plus, commercetools, Microsoft)
Expertise in experience design and cutting-edge technologies
Proven track record demonstrated by multiple industry awards (e.g., Adobe Partner of the Year, Salesforce Talent Alliance Diversity Champion)
Commitment to data-driven designs, innovative thinking, robust planning, and seamless delivery
Strong focus on client experience goals
Demonstrated commitment to quality in service delivery
implementation_scenarios: Platform-specific solution implementation (e.g., Salesforce-based HR solutions)
integration_capabilities: Integration with Adobe Experience Cloud platforms
primary_users: Employees (for recognition programs and compensation information)
